DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Adapalene/BP Gel to EPIDUO® FORTE and Both to a Placebo Control in Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multiple-Site, Parallel Design, Bioequivalence with Clinical Endpoints.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or non pregnant female aged ≥ 12 and ≤ 40years with a clinical diagnosis of acne vulgaris. Female Subjects who are pregnant, nursing or planning to become pregnant during study participation
